game:modeldesc-seraph: Tall humanoids of mysterious origins, that recently started to appear all over the world.
setting-comment-min_size_range: Min model size player can choose when cerating character.
setting-comment-max_size_range: Max model size player can choose when creating character.
setting-comment-size_factor: Scales player model independently of model size selected when creating character.
setting-comment-max_collision_box_vetric: Restricts collision box height, is used to allow player to pass under 2 blocks high opennings. Without restricton if collider is heigher thaSn 2.0, player will have to crouch to go though doors.
setting-comment-max_collision_box_horizo: Restricts collision box width, to allow player to squize into 1 blocks wide opennings.
setting-comment-max_eye_height: Restricts eye height, if eye height is higher than 2.0, player camera will clip into blocks when passing rhough 2 blocks high opennings.
setting-comment-export_shape_files: Will export adjusted shapes of every equiped piece of armor/clothes on retesselation, which you can trigger by equiping something. Will export shapes into ModConfig folder.
